sentences.en: But pretty soon the theory of fiscal retrenchment will be translated into real political pain.
sentences.cn: 但财政紧缩的理论,将很快转化为实实在在的政治阵痛.

sentences.en: Defence planners predict an extended period of retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 国防规划人员们预计，开支紧缩期会延长。

sentences.en: Defense planners predict an extended period of retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 国防规划人员预计开支紧缩期会延长。

sentences.en: First, rightly or wrongly ( wrongly, in my view ), the zone set on fiscal retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 首先, 无论对错 ( 在我看来是错的 ), 欧元区已决意实施财政紧缩.

sentences.en: However, a stringent programme of fiscal retrenchment will also be necessary.
sentences.cn: 然而严格的财政缩减项目是必须的.

sentences.en: In his spring budget he will need to reinforce his commitment to retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 在其春季预算中,他还需进一步紧缩开支.

sentences.en: Now, businesses are catching up with a retrenchment of their own.
sentences.cn: 现在, 商业企业也同样在压缩开支.

sentences.en: Or will such a zealous embrace of fiscal retrenchment tip the economy back into recession?
sentences.cn: 或者,如此狂热地奉行财政紧缩,是否会把英国经济重新推入衰退?

sentences.en: Retrenchment in the colleges could force thousands of students back into the unemployment lines.
sentences.cn: 学院若缩减经费,数千名学生将被迫回到失业工人的行列.

sentences.en: Retrenchment is inevitable and it is unlikely to be gradual or well planned.
sentences.cn: 节流是必然的,但是它不可能稳步规划,按部就班.

sentences.en: Retrenchment was also the message from manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 裁员也是来自于制造业危机的信息之一.

sentences.en: That means massive private retrenchment, with corporations particularly frugal at the moment.
sentences.cn: 这意味着私人部门大规模缩减开支, 而企业眼下尤为节俭.

sentences.en: The company is in for a period of retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 公司目前正值削减开支阶段.

sentences.en: The president of our university has given us two reasons: annual budget cut and faculty retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 大学校长给我们两点理由:年度 预算的紧缩以及教师的削减.

sentences.en: The question is if Monday's overdue correction marks a larger retrenchment.
sentences.cn: 问题是,周一的过度调整是否标志着更大幅度的下跌.

sentences.en: Thus, far from being stabilising, premature fiscal retrenchment threatens destabilisation of the world economy.
sentences.cn: 因此, 过早实施财政紧缩非但不会产生稳定效应, 反而会威胁到全球经济的稳定.
